sen.j: 七世 野村万蔵（のむら まんぞう、1930年(昭和5年)1月10日 -）とは和泉流狂言師。
sen.e: Manzo NOMURA, the seventh (January 10, 1930 - present) is the kyogen performer of Izumi school.
Manzo NOMURA, the Seventh (January 10, 1930 - present) is a kyogen performer of the Izumi school.
sen.cmt: the Seventh、a kyogen performer of the Izumi schoolとしました。
sen.e: Manzo NOMURA, the Seventh (January 10, 1930 - present) is a kyogen performer of the Izumi school.

sen.j: 旧名は、四世野村万之丞。
sen.e: His former name was Mannojo NOMURA, the forth.
His former name was Mannojo NOMURA, the Fourth.
His former name was Mannojo NOMURA, the Fourth.

sen.j: 現在は隠居名、野村萬（初代）を名乗る。
sen.e: He currently uses his inkyomei (name after retirement) of Man NOMURA, the first.
He currently uses his inkyomei (name after retirement) of Man NOMURA, the First.
He currently uses his inkyomei (name after retirement) of Man NOMURA, the First.

sen.j: 本名・野村太良（たろう）。
sen.e: His real name is Taro NOMURA.
His real name is Taro NOMURA.
His real name is Taro NOMURA.

sen.j: 野村万蔵 (6世)の長男として東京都に生まれる。
sen.e: He was born as the eldest son of Manzo NOMURA (the sixth) in Tokyo Prefecture.
He was born as the eldest son of Manzo NOMURA (the Sixth) in Tokyo Prefecture.
He was born as the eldest son of Manzo NOMURA (the Sixth) in Tokyo Prefecture.

sen.j: 重要無形文化財保持者（人間国宝）。
sen.e: He is the holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property (Living National Treasure).
He is the holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property (Living National Treasure).
He is the holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property (Living National Treasure).

sen.j: （社）日本芸能実演家団体協議会会長。
sen.e: He is the president of Japan Council of Performers' Organizations.
He is the president of Japan Council of Performers' Organizations.
He is the president of Japan Council of Performers' Organizations.

sen.j: 子に故・野村万蔵 (8世)（野村万之丞）、野村万蔵 (9世)（二世野村与十郎）。
sen.e: His children are the late Manzo NOMURA (the eighth)(Mannojo NOMURA) and Manzo NOMURA (the nineth)(Yojuro NOMURA, the second).
His children are the late Manzo NOMURA (the Eighth) (Mannojo NOMURA) and Manzo NOMURA (the Ninth) (Yojuro NOMURA, the second).
sen.cmt: the eighth→the Eighth、the nineth→the Ninthに修正、カッコ前後のスペース追加
sen.e: His children are the late Manzo NOMURA (the Eighth) (Mannojo NOMURA) and Manzo NOMURA (the Ninth) (Yojuro NOMURA, the second).

sen.j: 弟に野村万作、野村四郎、野村万之介。
sen.e: His brothers are Mansaku NOMURA, Shiro NOMURA, and Mannosuke NOMURA.
His younger brothers are Mansaku NOMURA, Shiro NOMURA, and Mannosuke NOMURA.
His younger brothers are Mansaku NOMURA, Shiro NOMURA, and Mannosuke NOMURA.

sen.j: 戦後、弟・万作とともに狂言のみならず現代演劇や前衛演劇に出演する。
sen.e: After the war, he appears on Kyogen (farce played during a No play cycle), modern plays, and avant-garde plays with his brother Mansaku.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: After the war, he appeared on modern plays and avant-garde plays as well as kyogen with his brother Mansaku.
sen.cmt: appears→appeared、表記統一のためKyogen→kyogenとし、(farce played during a No play cycle)削除、訳文一部修正
sen.e: After the war, he appeared on modern plays and avant-garde plays as well as kyogen with his brother Mansaku.

sen.j: そのほか、「おしん」や「翔ぶが如く (NHK大河ドラマ)」などテレビドラマにも出演。
sen.e: Other than that, he appears on TV drama such as 'Oshin' and 'Tobuga gotoku (NHK Historical drama).'
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Other than that, he appeared on TV drama such as 'Oshin' and 'Tobu ga Gotoku' (NHK Historical drama).
sen.cmt: appears→appeared、Tobu ga Gotokuとし、クォーテーションの位置を移動
sen.e: Other than that, he appeared on TV drama such as 'Oshin' and 'Tobu ga Gotoku' (NHK Historical drama).

sen.j: その一方で小学校やホールでの公演も重ね、狂言の一般的普及に大きく貢献した。
sen.e: On the other hand, he repeatedly performs at elementary schools and halls and largely contributes to spread Kyogen to the public.
On the other hand, he repeatedly performed at elementary schools and halls and largely contributed to spread kyogen to the public.
sen.cmt: performs→performed、contributes→contributed、表記統一のためKyogen→kyogenとしました。
sen.e: On the other hand, he repeatedly performed at elementary schools and halls and largely contributed to spread kyogen to the public.

sen.j: 現在も多くの舞台で活躍し、後進の育成にも力を注いでいる。
sen.e: He still plays on many stages and is dedicated to training the young.
He still plays on many stages and is dedicated to training the young.
He still plays on many stages and is dedicated to training the young.

sen.j: 2000年(平成12年)に隠居名、野村萬を名乗る。
sen.e: He started to use his inkyomei Man NOMURA in 2000.
He started to use his inkyomei Man NOMURA in 2000.
He started to use his inkyomei Man NOMURA in 2000.
He was selected as Persons of Cultural Merit in 2008.
He was selected as Persons of Cultural Merit in 2008.
He was selected as Persons of Cultural Merit in 2008.
